Room.Name: Khelleva Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Khelleva Drive, just south of the Khelleva Mansion.
Room.LongDescription: The Khelleva Mansion main entrance is located to the north of here. The large, marble statues and eloquent art design set the Khelleva Estates apart from every other city structure in Oceancrest. The Stables are located to the west and may be entered off of Khelleva Drive further to the northwest.
